product_name: Merrell Lorelei Twine Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Casual and comfortable, the Merrell Lorelei Twine Shoes feature flexible and durable pig suede uppers that stand up to your everyday adventures around town. Polyester mesh and linings wick moisture away from feet; Aegis(R) Microbe Shield antimicrobial treatment deters odor development. Q-Form(TM) alignment system provides women with a precise anatomic fit for superb, tailored comfort. EVA midsoles with air cushion heel pods deliver cushioning comfort underfoot; molded nylon arch shanks add support and help control flex. Merrell Lorelei Twine Shoes have low-profile rubber outsoles for everyday use. Closeout.
short_description: Casual and comfortable, the Merrell Lorelei Twine Shoes feature flexible and durable pig suede uppers that stand up to your everyday adventures around town.
